modernize-use-default-member-init.option:
Static analysis (Clang-Tidy) options are configured via .clang-tidy file.

Options
UseAssignment
If this option is set to
true
(default is
false
), the check will initialize
members with an assignment. For example:
struct
A
{
A
()
{}
A
(
int
i
)
:
i
(
i
)
{}
int
i
=
5
;
double
j
=
10.0
;
};
IgnoreMacros
If this option is set to
true
(default is
true
), the check will not warn
about members declared inside macros.
